name: Disaster Island (Early Access)
description:
Welcome to Disaster Island! A game by Felix Filip.

In this game, you try to survive natural disasters with your friends, or random people! Gain Disaster Coins to buy stuff in the shop when it comes out!

Credits:

-Felix Filip: Scripts and Development before v1.0

-Maker26: 3D Modeling and rigging

-Aesthetical: Scripting and Development since v1.0

-Vanderley5974X: Music

More credits ingame!
